summary:
Crowbot Automation - Welcome to CrowBot, a 100% Autonomous Airdrop Automation Tool for Farming new protocols in Bulk! Built by masterminds to help you step up your farming game.

 Crowbot Automation Tool - CrowBot stands out in airdrop farming for its efficiency and precision. It expertly manages tasks from wallet management to protocol interactions, saving time and increasing successful airdrop collections. Its ability to automate and scale interactions makes it crucial for optimizing airdrop farming.

 Crowbot Security - CrowBot ensures top-notch security in airdrop farming. It uses advanced algorithms to mimic human digital behavior, reducing detection risks. Now with IP detection proofing, it offers a safer, flag-free airdrop farming experience, allowing users to engage in various opportunities securely.

 Protocols and Projects - We offer the following protocols and projects to be farmed via our automation tool:

The bot will interact with smart contracts which are recognized or part of popular DEXs/DAPPS.
By automating transactions the bot aims to amass volume and transactions. More protocols will be implemented as the project progresses.

 Tokenomics - 5% Buy/Sell Tax

25,000,000 Total Supply

100% Locked Liquidity pool

 Beta Stats - These are the stats from our beta version of the bot.

1.000.000$+ Transaction volume

700+ Wallets running

 Farming Tiers - We offer the following tiers of automated mass farming:

Elite Tier: 250,000 $CROW

Advanced Tier: 100,000 $CROW

Intermediate Tier: 50,000 $CROW

Basic Tier: 25,000 $CROW
